text: Francisco "Paco" Frutos Gras (6 September 1939 â€“ 26 July 2020) was a Spanish politician. From 1998 until 2009, he was the Secretary-General of the Communist Party of Spain (PCE). He was born in Calella, Spain. He died on 26 July 2020, aged 80. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Spanish politicians
title: Francisco Frutos
